actions-list.actionItem: The Speaker announced that the House do now adjourn pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5. The next meeting is scheduled for 12:00 p.m. on June 5, 2023.

actions-list.header: ADJUSTMENT OF THE WHOLE NUMBER OF THE HOUSE
actions-list.actionItem: Under clause 5(d) of Rule XX, the Chair announced to the House that, in light of the resignation of the gentleman from Rhode Island, Mr. Cicilline, the whole number of the House is 434.
The Chair led the House in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Journal of the last day's proceedings was approved.
Today's prayer was offered by the House Chaplain, Chaplain Margaret Grun Kibben.
The Speaker designated the Honorable Lori Chavez-DeRemer to act as Speaker pro tempore for today.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
